item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.

item.title: About
item.description: This blog has three authors: Jack Bailey, Jon Mellon, and Chris Prosser. We’re colleagues on the British Election Study, though the blog is not affiliated with the BES. Instead, it’s a place for us to share small insights that we’ve come across in our day-to-day work. Some of these insights will be about statistics, some will be about politics, and some will be miscellaneous. But all come with an important health warning: they might be wrong and are always subject to revision.
